name: Avatar.Root
description: A graphical representation of the user, often used in profile sections.
description_zh: A graphical representation of the user, often used in profile sections.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; image: string; fallback: string }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the avatar. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 头像中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

events.name: statusChange
events.description: Functional called when the image loading status changes.
events.description_zh: 当图像加载状态更改时调用的函数。
